    StandardizedMatrices.StandardizedMatrices
    StandardizedMatrices.StandardizedMatrix — Type.

    Treat a matrix as standardized, similar to z = StatsBase.zscore(x, 1), without altering the original data.

    z = StandardizedMatrix(x::AbstractMatrix) z = StandardizedMatrix(x::AbstractMatrix, μ::AbstractVector, σ::AbstractVector)
